DataElement.preferredName: Image Finding Cyst Dimension Perpendicular Measurement
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The number that represents the second or perpendicular measurement in millimeters of a cyst.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Distinguishing qualities of the greatest sized cyst found in an imaging study.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.:Clinical manifestations that can be either objective when observed by a physician, or subjective when perceived by the patient.

Concepts.definition: Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.
Clinical, laboratory or molecular evidence, or absence of evidence of disease.

Property.preferredDefinition: Greatest in size of those under consideration.:(sist) A sac or capsule filled with fluid.

Concepts.definition: Greatest in size of those under consideration.
A sac-like closed membranous structure that may be empty or contain fluid or amorphous material.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

DataElementConcept.origin: ACRIN:American College of Radiology Imaging Network
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 2/27/09 - released for reuse by DCP.  3/20/07 - Created to support ACRIN Breast CDE development task.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the second or perpendicular measurement (at a right angle to a line or plane relative to a straight line through a body) measured in millimeters used to calculate the longest bidimensional measurement for a lesion or tumor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: any measurements, including linear dimensions, volume, and weight, of a patient's tumor.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Having the greater length of two or the greatest length of several.:A straight line through a body or figure that is at a right angle to a given line or plane.:Measurement; the size or magnitude of something.

Concepts.definition: Having the greater length of two or the greatest length of several.
A straight line through a body or figure that is at a right angle to a given line or plane.
Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.

ClassificationSchemeItems.longName: Acolbifene - High Risk for Breast Cancer
